page.title: 18Public Houses
page.content: The{Duke William}at Ickham specialises in Real Ale. They have a restaurant, games room for pool and darts, a garden and childrens area. The{Rose}at W'breux can provide bed and breakfast and has a darts team. The{Haywain}at Bramling has an organ for entertainment and the{Eight Bells}at Wingham Well is a free house with a restaurant. In L'bourne there are three pubs, the{King William}has two darts teams, bed and breakfast accom- odation and a restaurant. The{Anchor} once a year auctions fruit, flowers and vegetables from allotments and gardens in aid of charity.The{Evenhill has darts and bat and trap teams and has live music once a week. There is a garden and childrens area. Bar meals with drinks are served in all the pubs and they provide a meeting place for villagers and visitors.
